title: Power units told to wrap up planned shutdowns by February
description: October onwards planned shutdowns have increased with the average planned outage for the month at 10,189 MW followed by 8,928 MW till November 21. Planned shutdowns of power plants can go anywhere from 15 days to 75 days, depending on the work required.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
